title: Different with dignity
brief_description: In five separate episodes, this film explores the various perceptions of male and female roles within a marriage. After each episode, a question is raised for further class discussion on everything from sexual stereotypes to what it means to be a good parent. Cast includes Richard Jackal, Jeffrey Hunter and Vera Miles.
